title: RITO! When will this end? BUGS
body:
More and more bugs come out as new patches, I've been playing this game during so many years and I do not remember when there has been so much the amount of Bugs as today. I don't know if this only happens to me but there are times that I feel tired because you can't play or you say WTF !!
RITE PLS STOP! Not only in rankeds, but also in the world, to the point of resetting a game and possibly change the course of it, take less things to buy with RP and fix more bugs and such things
Here I lshow the last thing has happened to me with Shaco, Thanks
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PcgKCT4X7vY
